* * *
[lisa.hsin@tufts.edu](mailto:lisa.hsin@tufts.edu) • 111 Miner Hall • Tufts University • Medford, MA 02155  • [(617) 627-2341](tel:6176272341)
* * *
  
### Research Interests

- Bilingual education & language development 
- Culturally and linguistically focused academic interventions
- Relationship of language acquisition to executive functions
- Theories of language acquisition & syntactic development

### Education

- Ph.D. in Cognitive Science, [The Johns Hopkins University](http://www.jhu.edu/), 2014
- M.A. in Cognitive Science, [The Johns Hopkins University](http://www.jhu.edu/), 2011
- A.B. (magna cum laude) in Spanish, minor in Linguistics, [Georgetown University](http://www.georgetown.edu/), 2007
